sentences: Bojanić was born to a family of ethnic Bosnian Serbs in Bijeljina, SR Bosnia and Herzegovina, SFR Yugoslavia, and lived in Ruhotina, near Bijeljina.
He moved to Serbia at a young age.
He has homes in Novi Sad (where he lives), Belgrade, and on the Montenegrin littoral.
Otišo sam mlad a vraćam se sed (1988)
Stara sreća na ljubav me seća (1988)
